name: SkyRunner
description:
SKYRUNNER

SkyRunner is a first person endless platform runner, portrayed as if it's an animated gif.

There might be an issue with the html5 version, so an Windows 64 executable is also available.

Instructions:

  • WS to move
  • Mouse to look (pitch only)
  • Space or LMB to jump
  • R to reset to last checkpoint
  • L to reload the game

Originally I thought this mash of genres was incompatible, but it turns out it fits all right together.

Lessons learned:

  • Procedural platform generation
  • Unity's Post processing stack 2
  • Ultimate FPS system's drawbacks and strengths
  • How much programming I am able to do on my own!

Thanks to @torfias & @joonturbo for help!
